title: hack3rcon
author: hack3rcon
content: Hello,What coins or tokens are related to artificial intelligence or machine learning technologies?Thank you.

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: https://cryptorank.io/tags/artificial-intelligenceHere you can see a list of such projects. In my opinion, this may turn out to be a new hype in the near future. The topic of artificial intelligence is being actively discussed in the community environment and it may have a certain impact on future projects. It may turn out to be one of the new rapidly developing trends.

comments.author: Hamza2424
comments.body: Ai is the future no doubt currently i am focusing on both metaverse and AI-related altcoins projects for the next bull run. There is no AI top established project yet but in 2024 i can see easily $60B+ market capital for the AI-related projects as VEchain is on my watchlist and there are many other good projects on board as Xal0lex already shared a list for such projects details.

comments.author: dwminer1
comments.body: I've been watching the project Matrix AI for some time and I'm thinking about investing. They are working on it for several years. The new roadmap looks promising in my opinion: https://1369953351-files.gitbook.io/~/files/v0/b/gitbook-x-prod.appspot.com/o/spaces%2FT5LtcFS1DoKk05KGaZdm%2Fuploads%2FOnsRSLdWol2UnvQRYM9t%2FMatrix%203.0%20Roadmap%20Full%20EN.pdf?alt=media&token=ef0cf8d3-81e0-473a-9da5-5ffad4dffe50The token is currently tradeable on Huobi or Kucoin: https://www.kucoin.com/trade/MAN-USDT?rcode=rPH7VCSThe team is active in social media and telegram, new team members are being hired. The current capitalization is around $5 million, so IMO there is a lot of room for growth.

comments.author: hack3rcon
comments.body: Hello,Thank you so much for your reply.What is the potential of the Fetch AI, Matrix AI and VeChain? Will they reach $1 in the next few years?

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: hack3rcon on January 16, 2023, 05:59:03 AMHello,What coins or tokens are related to artificial intelligence or machine learning technologies?Thank you.There are lots of projects related to AI but of course these projects werent totally known since the idea of AI has just later been resurface. Most of retailers thinks that this will be the new hype but without having the hype, I think many will get used to it cause if we think about this, its the interesting use case among the blockchain related projects.

comments.author: dwminer1
comments.body: Quote from: hack3rcon on January 18, 2023, 06:52:06 AMHello,Thank you so much for your reply.What is the potential of the Fetch AI, Matrix AI and VeChain? Will they reach $1 in the next few years?It's really hard to predict if any of these projects will reach the price of $1. Many factors will influence this. Certainly, the possible hype for projects in the AI industry would help a lot. Let's do some math, I'll analyze the AI Matrix project they're following. Currently, the price is around $0.025, so it takes a 40x increase to reach $1. It's really quite a number. But let's look at the market cap. Currently, it is $5 million, so with the assumed growth of 40x, we will get a value of $200 million. This would currently place around 150 on the CMC list, so it doesn't look like an unattainable thing for a solid project. And let's remember that during the bull run, even complete shitcoins, under the influence of a slight hype, they achieved a market capitalization much higher than the aforementioned $200 million. All in all, I believe that if the project develops well and the conditions are favorable, then $1 is realistic in this case. However, I treat it as a risky investment. Remember, always DYOR.

comments.author: GreatArkansas
comments.body: I don't really know and I am curious why Artificial Intelligence / Machine Learning does need cryptocurrency. It seems really does not work together.Maybe they will do some token sales to support their development of AI/ML projects. But seems the use case of the token itself is not relevant.

comments.author: livingfree
comments.body: I think even if a project is named after an Ai, it doesnt determine the future of it. And even if the market is pulling into the trend of Ai, it is still the market that shall determine them.You really have to closely monitor them as no one can answer you definitively on what will be the future of those. Ai is becoming big and trendy but still unsure for those projects related to crypto.

comments.author: yusrime
comments.body: AI is indeed a rapidly growing field with a wide range of potential applications, from healthcare and transportation to finance and gaming. The concept of the metaverse, a virtual universe where users can interact with each other and digital objects in a highly immersive and interactive way, is also gaining traction. It is likely that AI and the metaverse will intersect in interesting ways in the future.In terms of AI-related altcoins, it is worth noting that the market for these projects is still relatively new and highly speculative. Investing in any kind of cryptocurrency carries a high level of risk and should be approached with caution. However, as the field of AI continues to advance, it is possible that some projects in this space could see significant growth in market capitalization over the next few years.It is also important to conduct thorough research and due diligence on any projects you are considering investing in, as well as keeping in mind that the crypto market is highly volatile and future performance is not guaranteed.

comments.author: Mr. Magkaisa
comments.body: Quote from: hack3rcon on January 16, 2023, 05:59:03 AMHello,What coins or tokens are related to artificial intelligence or machine learning technologies?Thank you.Here are the coin that are related to AI such as follows:Quote* Meta Masters Guild (MEMAG) - Mobile-Focused Web3 Gaming Guild* Fetch.ai - AI-Based Decentralized Economy* The Graph - Decentralized Indexing Protocol for Blockchain Data* VeChain - AI-Optimized Supply Chain Solution* SingularityNET - Decentralized Marketplace for AI ServicesSource: https://cryptonews.com/news/ai-crypto-coins.htmAI can also be use for Mining, wallet security, blockchain analysis, Trading and Risk management.

comments.author: Sayeds56
comments.body: Quote from: hack3rcon on January 18, 2023, 06:52:06 AMHello,Thank you so much for your reply.What is the potential of the Fetch AI, Matrix AI and VeChain? Will they reach $1 in the next few years?The potential of all AI-related coins (mentioned in your post) to reach $1 in future will largely depend on factors such as , demand for AI technology in the market & speed of technological advancement. It is also worth mentioning that, another AI coin AGIX, which is  listed on Binance, has shown significant growth in price during the past two weeks, which reflects strong interest of investors in this project.Additionally, Vechain & Fetch are listed on Binance exchange, Matrix is currently not listed on any centralized exchange and is traded on Uniswap.

comments.author: TastyChillySauce00
comments.body: Quote from: hack3rcon on January 18, 2023, 06:52:06 AMHello,Thank you so much for your reply.What is the potential of the Fetch AI, Matrix AI and VeChain? Will they reach $1 in the next few years?Vechain was a smartcontract project and it's not related to AI. To be honest I think that AI projects in the crypto were not as promising as any other project. They will not reach $1 without the hype. There's no reason for vechain to worth $1 with so many supply like that. The ai projects in the crypto were dead since last year. I think that the project like fetch ai and another ai projects were useless. ChatGPT has been transforming AI into the new thing but I never seen crypto AI projects were making something useful like chatGPT

comments.author: Bitstar_coin
comments.body: Is this going to be the next trend starting from 2023 to the market period? I can see the interest in AI and projects related to it is growing lately, perhaps the success and popularity of the Chat GPT have something to do with it.If there is any project that will do well in this space, that should be AI related because unarguably AI is gaining ground in most sectors of the economy. So holding any of these AI-related projects can be profitable in the long run.

comments.author: KiaKia
comments.body: Metaverse and A.I will work very well together, that's why I am so bullish on these two utilities, Fetch AI and Singularity Net are old skool, though they can upgrade but I won't be focusing much on them, I will go for new AI projects like Alethea AI and VAIOT, I believe that few promising projects will show up before 2023 runs out.

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: Quote from: hack3rcon on January 16, 2023, 05:59:03 AMWhat coins or tokens are related to artificial intelligence or machine learning technologies?You can see a complete list of top to bottom AI & Big Data projects on CMC, here's the link, mate: https://coinmarketcap.com/view/ai-big-data/Quote from: hack3rcon on January 18, 2023, 06:52:06 AMWhat is the potential of the Fetch AI, Matrix AI and VeChain? Will they reach $1 in the next few years?I personally haven't paid particular attention to the three projects you mentioned, so I can't say my opinion about those projects. But if we compare those three projects to the current top AI projects (GRT), $FET and $MAN have a very good chance to be at $1 (if they can surpass the MC of $GRT). BTW, what made you interested in those tokens? Do you think that 2023 is the year for AI tokens?

comments.author: Sayeds56
comments.body: Quote from: hack3rcon on January 18, 2023, 06:53:39 AMQuote from: Xal0lex on January 17, 2023, 03:06:36 PMhttps://cryptorank.io/tags/artificial-intelligenceHere you can see a list of such projects. I believe AI is the next hype in crypto as it can potentially change the way the crypto space works and could solve many problems it has faced. The success of CharGPT has drawn the attention of investors in AI sector which looks very promising and could potentially create hype in crypto & likely to lead the next bull cycle.https://www.forbes.com/sites/qai/2023/01/12/you-want-the-next-big-trend-its-artificial-intelligence-in-crypto/?sh=3d76d488622d

It is also worth mentioning that, another AI coin AGIX, which is  listed on Binance, has shown significant growth in price during the past two weeks, which reflects strong interest of investors in this project.Additionally, Vechain & Fetch are listed on Binance exchange, Matrix is currently not listed on any centralized exchange and is traded on Uniswap.Matrix AI (MAN) is listed on Kucoin: https://www.kucoin.com/trade/MAN-USDTAccording to CMC, MAN is also on other exchanges:Please note, however, that ERC-20 tokens are traded on other exchanges, and Matrix has its own native tokens since 2019. Currently, you can still manuall swap ERC-20 tokens to MAN mainnet, but this option will soon be disabled.
